episode_body:
Case: Dana-Jackson-MVA-1-24-2024
Client: Dana Jackson

__CLIENT CONTACT__
__Details:__ Client called repeatedly back to back (4x within 30-45 minutes) yesterday - Reviewed - Sent Update to Client via Text:

Good afternoon Dana,
We noticed you call multiple times (back to back) yesterday. Unfortunately, our office was closed due to impending winter storm that was expected. Please keep in mind multiple phone calls will only delay our response time as we wade through all the client voicemails who call multiple times.
However, Bryce has spoken with the Defense Counsel and the Defense has requested a 3 week extension to respond to our Discovery Request sent to the Defendant Driver. This extension grants a new deadline of March 11, 2025. If the Defense has not responded on March 12, 2025, Bryce will file a Motion to Compel with the courts. This motion will be set for the 1st available Monday.
Once the Defendant Responses are received, there is a 30 day review period. If no other documents are needed, we will move forward with Deposition Scheduling. If additional documents/information is required, Deposition scheduling will be delayed until all written discovery is complete. If you have any other questions, please do not hesitate to contact us directly to discuss them in further detail. -Sarena, The Whaley Law Firm 
__Person Making Contact:__ Sarena
__Date & Time__: February 20 2025
